name: A-Deadly-Path
description:
A Deadly Path is a short and sweet platform game. Your objective is to get to the flag, to do so, you must die a few times to get rid of obstacles and create your own platforms!

The goal of the game is to get to the flag to move on to the next level.

Remember to switch between both characters with Space!!!

Controls:
  • WASD or Arrow-Keys to move.
  • Space bar to switch between characters.
  • The menu is also controlled in the same way.
  • No gamepad support.
  • You may skip a Level with "Enter" or go back to a previous level with "Backspace".
  • Restart a level with "R"
Suggestions:
  • Play the downloadable Windows version if possible for the best experience.
  • For the Windows version, you can click on the top-right corner of the window to  make the game Full-screen!
  • If you are having trouble with a Level but want to see what's ahead, don't hesitate on skipping that Level, you can always go back to it later.
  • If for some reason you can't control the game in the web version, try reloading the page!
  • If the game window is too small for your screen, try zooming in a little bit and refreshing the page :)
